1.Name: NewsAnchor
1.Dialogue: Good evening, Amourtia! Breaking News: Mantle was not a hero, but a villain parading as one all along!

2.Name: NewsAnchor
2.Dialogue: Created by the mad inventor, Leo Everett, Mantle met his end at the hands of Amourtia's savior, Harbinger.

3.Name: NewsAnchor
3.Dialogue: Our hero, though doubted by many, was right in his suspicions. Following his gut, Harbinger ousted the mad inventor and made Amourtia safe once again.
